newsitem.title: USA: Catalina crushed after EPS news, downgrades.
newsitem.headline: Catalina crushed after EPS news, downgrades.

text.p: Shares in Catalina Marketing Corp went into a freefall Tuesday after a delayed opening on the New York Stock Exchange, following a company warning that fourth quarter earnings would falll short of expectations.
The first NYSE trade was at 28-1/4, off 12-3/8 to a new year low, according to the exchange,
Later, Catalina leveled off at 29-1/8, down 11-1/2, or 28.3 percent.
The exchange said the stock opened at 1122 EST/1622. Just after midday, 1.2 million shares had changed hands, more than 10 times Catalina's average daily volume.
